MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: Mapping to load the history data to stg_haa_customers_hist table

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: lookup table to populate the as_of_date
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_DAY_DIM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DAY_DIMENSION.DAY_DATE as DAY_DATE, DAY_DIMENSION.AS_OF_DATE as AS_OF_DATE FROM DAY_DIMENSION

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: lookup table to populate the as_of_date
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_DAY_DIM
